body.p: The purpose of a references element is to collect all (or many) references that you intend to use in your project in a file. It may simplify maintainance considerably, and it opens for a systematic reference policy. You may access the individual reference by PI and you may produce reference lists by PI . You may even control any URI's in a reference by PI .
The definitions-element may contain any number of references elements.
